name: PulseChain
short_description: PulseChain is an EVM-compatible layer-1 blockchain, a fork of Ethereum, created by Richard Heart. It aims to provide a more scalable, energy-efficient, and cheaper network than Ethereum by using a delegated proof-of-stake (DPoS) consensus mechanism. Its native token is PLS, used for fees and activating validators, and it supports a decentralized exchange called PulseX for swapping tokens and NFTs.
